resources.string: Allows headboard to run in the background while you navigate your device.

string-array.name: event_type_description_keys_values
string-array.item: Choose an input that will tap on items on your phone, like apps, text, buttons, and more
Choose an input that will perform a continuous swipe
Choose an input that will perform a toggle swipe
Choose an input that will open your phoneâ€™s home screen
Choose an input that will go back to the last screen
Choose an input that will open your notifications
Choose an input that will pause or unpause your cursor
Choose an input that will reset your cursor position
Choose an input that will touch \& hold, otherwise known as a long press, on your phone
Choose an input that will open your all apps
Choose an input that will toggle a swipe
Choose an input that will perform a long touch on your phone
Choose an input that will begin a touch
Choose an input that will end a touch
Choose an input that will perform a combined tap on your phone
